mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY (COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_URL, COMPANY_PHONE, COMPANY_ADDR, COMPANY_MAP, COMPANY_STATE, COMPANY_ETC, COMPANY_REG_DTM, COMPANY_MOD_DTM) VALUES (#{company_name}, #{company_url}, #{company_phone}, #{company_addr}, #{company_map}, #{company_state}, #{company_etc}, NOW(), NOW())
